name: Modern Meadow in lake crib set
description:
Design your own Modern Meadow crib set. 100% cotton. Made to fit cribs that fit a standard crib mattress (28 x 52").

The set includes:

--one fitted crib sheet (fully encased elastic around entire perimeter, hidden french seams).
--one 3-sided tailored crib skirt with 14" drop (optional kick pleat / accent fabric in the pleat).

Machine washable, tumble dry with like items.

*The finished bedding shown is for example purposes only. Your set will be made to your specifications.

Choose:
--1 sheet fabric
--1 skirt fabric
--if applicable, 1 accent fabric for the inlay of the skirt pleat.

During checkout, please leave a note for me with your fabric selections (1-12).

Shipping Details:
Please allow 4-6 weeks for your bedding to be made.
Ships from CT via USPS Priority Mail with tracking.

name: Baby Comforter
description:
This comforter is made-to-order and available in a number of fabric designs to suit your child's room. Choose from the fabrics in my the shop, and leave a note with your fabric selections during checkout (top, reverse side, and piping).

*** This listing is for STANDARD COTTONS only. Choosing ORGANIC or PRINT-ON-DEMAND fabric is extra. Please inquire for pricing and a reserved listing. Thanks!

Details:
-- Size 35 x 45 in.
-- Polyester batting
-- 100% cotton.
-- Machine wash cold

Shipping Details:
Ships from CT via USPS Priority Mail with tracking in 2-3 weeks from order date (longer with other items).

name: Elephant March Crib Set
description:
You don't need to go all out with a full bedding set. Add a punch of personality with just a few Lil' Slumber basics. Made for cribs that fit a standard crib mattress (28 x 52").

---------------------------------

This set includes:

--one fitted crib sheet in your choice of solid color.

--one 35" x 45" reversible comforter made in Elephant March and reversing to Minky Dimple Dot. Piping trim in your choice of solid color.

--one tailored crib skirt (straight or single center pleat) in your choice of solid color.

---------------------------------

Materials:
100% cotton. 100% Poly batting (high loft).

Care:
Machine washable, tumble dry with like items.

*The finished bedding shown is for example purposes only. Your set will be made in the Elephant March fabrics.

During checkout, please specify your solid color choices and skirt style .

Shipping Details:
Please allow 4-6 weeks for your bedding to be made.
Ships from CT via USPS Priority Mail with tracking.

name: Pleated Crib Skirt
description:
Tailored crib skirt with kick pleat(s) on the front panel.

During checkout, please specify your fabric choice(s) (main fabric, optional pleat fabric). ***Standard quilting cottons only. A surcharge will apply for choosing organic or print-on-demand fabric.

Details:
-- 3-sided
-- 14" drop
-- kick pleat(s) with optional accent fabric in the pleat
-- serged seams

Shipping Details:
Please allow 2-3weeks for your skirt to be made.
Ships from CT via USPS Priority Mail with tracking.

name: Elephant March Fitted Crib Sheet
description:
One fitted crib sheet made Elephant March.

Our crib sheets have french seams at the corners, which means that the raw edges of the fabric are fully enclosed for a neat finish. This also makes the seams stronger, so you can wash again and again without any worries. The elastic is fully encased around the entire perimeter (not just the corners). These fit any standard crib mattress that measures approx. 52 x 28".

Machine washable, tumble dry with like items.

If you would like a different fabric or a custom size, just ask! Most of our fitted sheets are $40. This listing is for a crib sheet made with a print-on-demand fabric and is $55.

name: bolster pillow
description:
Complete your nursery with a custom made bolster pillow. Coordinate with your existing decor or custom bedding. Choose from the fabrics in the Bedding Set section of the shop.

Made to order. 
Please allow 2-3 weeks production time (4-6 weeks with custom bedding).

During checkout, please specify your fabric choices (main fabric and trim fabric). *A $10 surcharge will apply for choosing organic or print-on-demand fabric for this item.

Details:
-- piped trim
-- 16" length X 6" diameter
-- 100% cotton
-- filled with ultra plush 100% polyester fiberfill
-- cover is not removable
-- spot clean

name: CHANGING PAD COVER
description:
